name: col/find
script: view.set_content_type('application/json'); var args = router.get_args(); var db_name = args[0]; var collection_name = args[1]; view.echo(storage.simple_find_all(db_name, collection_name, '{}')); view.finish();

name: col/edit
script: view.set_page('edit_item'); var args = router.get_args(); var db_name = args[0]; var collection_name = args[1]; var oid = args[2]; var value = storage.simple_find_first(db_name, collection_name, '{"_id": {"$oid": "' + oid + '"}}');

name: col/findOne
script: view.set_content_type('application/json'); var args = router.get_args(); var db_name = args[0]; var collection_name = args[1]; var oid = args[2]; view.echo(storage.simple_find_first(db_name, collection_name, '{"_id": {"$oid": "' + oid + '"}}')); view.finish();

name: col/update
col/create
script: view.set_page('create_item'); var args = router.get_args(); var db_name = args[0]; var collection_name = args[1];

name: col/insert
col/delete
